thread.title_full: Economics - Term of the Day - Feb 24, 2017

title: Economics - Term of the Day - Feb 24, 2017
text: economies of sc... Use 'economics' in a Sentence Many students who pursue a career in business must study economics to help better understand why businesses make certain decisions based on the current economic state. 23 people found this helpful An ever popular field of study for undergraduate students is economics because many students have post-grad Wall street aspirations, however, few economic majors actually end up on Wall Street in the end. 19 people found this helpful He wanted to improve his management skills by enrolling in business college, but simple economics made him realize that he couldn't go to classes and make enough money to provide for his family at the same time. 17 people found this helpful
